content: TE Connectivity Ltd  a Swiss-based manufacturer of electronics and sensors  said it would buy Creganna Medical Group for $895 million  expanding in the fast-growing business of making equipment used in minimally invasive procedures.
name: TE Connectivity Ltd
title: TE Connectivity pushes into medical devices with Creganna buy

content: * TE Connectivity's shares fall 3 pct   (Adds executive comment from conference call  shares)
name: TE Connectivity Ltd
title: UPDATE 2-TE Connectivity pushes into medical devices with Creganna buy

content: Feb 2 Communication equipment maker TE Connectivity Ltd said it would buy Ireland-based medical device maker Creganna Medical group for $895 million in cash.
name: TE Connectivity Ltd
title: TE Connectivity to buy Creganna Medical Group for $895 mln

content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) NEW YORK  January 26 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings affirms the ratings for TE  Connectivity Ltd. (NYSE:TEL; TE Connectivity) and its wholly owned subsidiary   Tyco Electronics Group S.A. (TEGSA). The Rating Outlook is Stable. Fitch also  assigns an 'A-' rating to the company's new $350 million 10-year unsecured  notes. The ratings affect $3.7 billion of total funded debt  excluding the $500 million  floating rate notes due Jan. 29  2016  which
name: TE Connectivity Ltd
title: Fitch Affirms TE Connectivity at 'A-/F2'; Outlook Stable

content: Swiss electronics company TE Connectivity Ltd is said to be nearing a deal to sell its network equipment unit to CommScope Holding Co Inc for about $3 billion  the Wall Street Journal reported  citing people familiar with the matter.
name: TE Connectivity Ltd
title: TE Connectivity nears deal to sell network business to CommScope: WSJ

content: Jan 27 The following corporate finance-related stories were reported by media:
name: TE Connectivity Ltd
title: REFILE-Market Chatter- Corporate finance press digest

content: Telecom equipment maker CommScope Holding Co Inc  said it would buy nearly all of Swiss electronics firm TE Connectivity's  network gear business for about $3 billion to expand in Europe and Asia.
name: TE Connectivity Ltd
title: CommScope to buy most of TE Connectivity's network business
